numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Mr. G has a fourth grade math group.
2. I noticed that more younger people think that the world is getting better than older people.
3. I noticed that poorer countries are more optimistic than wealthier countries in general.
4. I wonder how you chose the countries that participated.
5. I wonder why most people are optimists.
6. I wonder why most people think that the world is getting better despite climate change and pollution.
7. I wonder why there were only 21 countries.
